tooltips.title: Info
tooltips.body: Finds data that follows a fixed format, like emails or phone numbers.

tooltips.title: Info
tooltips.body: AI models that understand language to find names, places, and organizations.

tooltips.title: Info
tooltips.body: Math checks to verify if a number is real (like credit card or IBAN).

tooltips.title: Info
tooltips.body: Looks at nearby words like "SSN:" to be more sure about a match.

tooltips.title: Info
tooltips.body: Swaps the data with a label like <PERSON> or your own text.

tooltips.title: Info
tooltips.body: Deletes the data completely. Nothing is left behind.

tooltips.title: Info
tooltips.body: Hides part of the data with stars or other characters.

tooltips.title: Info
tooltips.body: Turns data into a unique code. Cannot be reversed.

tooltips.title: Info
tooltips.body: Locks data with a secret key. Can be unlocked later.

tooltips.title: Info
tooltips.body: Unlocks encrypted data to get the original back.

tooltips.title: Info
tooltips.body: The main scanner. Tells you what PII was found and how sure it is.

tooltips.title: Info
tooltips.body: Uses OCR to read images, finds PII, then blacks it out.

tooltips.title: Info
tooltips.body: Uses the secret key to unlock and restore the original data.

tooltips.title: Info
tooltips.body: Freelancers & Consultants: Protect client data in proposals and deliverables before sharing.

tooltips.title: Info
tooltips.body: Translators: Anonymize documents before CAT tools. Protect source material confidentiality.

tooltips.title: Info
tooltips.body: HR Teams: Handle CVs and employee records safely. GDPR-compliant processing of personal data.

tooltips.title: Info
tooltips.body: Developers: Create safe test data from production. Transform real data into realistic synthetic data.

tooltips.title: Info
tooltips.body: Researchers: Anonymize interview transcripts and survey responses for ethical research.

tooltips.title: Info
tooltips.body: Marketing Agencies: Sanitize case studies and client examples. Safe portfolio sharing.

tooltips.title: Info
tooltips.body: Journalists: Protect sources and sensitive information. Maintain confidentiality in reporting.

tooltips.title: Info
tooltips.body: Comprehensive detection: Names, emails, phone numbers, credit cards, SSNs, IBANs, IP addresses across 15 categories with confidence scoring.

tooltips.title: Info
tooltips.body: Global support: English, German, Spanish, French, Italian, Portuguese, Dutch, Polish, Russian, Japanese, Chinese, Korean, Arabic and more. Auto-detection included.

tooltips.title: Info
tooltips.body: Protection methods: Replace (synthetic data), Redact (remove), Hash (SHA-256), Encrypt (AES-256-GCM reversible), Mask (partial hide).

tooltips.title: Info
tooltips.body: Transparent & auditable: Uses predefined patterns for 100% reproducible results. Same input = same output. Fully auditable for compliance.

tooltips.title: Info
tooltips.body: Desktop App: Windows, macOS, Linux. Supports PDF, DOCX, XLSX, CSV, JSON, XML, TXT. Offline capability with secure vault.

tooltips.title: Info
tooltips.body: Office Integration: Native Word, Excel, PowerPoint add-in. Works in-place without copy-paste. Reversible encryption supported.

tooltips.title: Info
tooltips.body: Chrome Extension: Developer Preview. Protects PII before sharing with ChatGPT, Claude, Gemini. Real-time detection.

tooltips.title: Info
tooltips.body: Developer API: RESTful endpoints with JWT authentication. Batch processing support. Rate limiting per tier.

tooltips.title: Info
tooltips.body: Mobile Access: Full functionality in any mobile browser (Chrome, Safari, Firefox, Edge). No app store installation needed.

tooltips.title: Info
tooltips.body: EU-hosted: Processing in Hetzner's ISO 27001-certified data centers in Germany. No data transfers outside EU. No jurisdiction surprises.

tooltips.title: Info
tooltips.body: ISO 27001: Certified infrastructure with 99.9% uptime SLA. Enterprise-grade security without vendor lock-in complexity.

tooltips.title: Info
tooltips.body: GDPR: Full GDPR compliance with Data Processing Agreement (DPA) available. Transparent, auditable processing for regulatory requirements.

tooltips.title: Info
tooltips.body: Built on Presidio: Microsoft's open-source PII detection framework. Proven technology, transparent codebase, no black-box AI.

tooltips.title: Info
tooltips.body: Target: Legal (court docs, contracts), Healthcare (HIPAA), Teachers (student essays), Students (screenshots).

tooltips.title: Info
tooltips.body: Use case: Detect and remove sensitive data before pasting into AI chat interfaces.

tooltips.title: Info
tooltips.body: Positioning: "Finally a privacy tool that doesn't require a computer science degree!"

tooltips.title: Info
tooltips.body: Testimonial: "I was afraid of computers, but this was so easy!" - Helga, 72, Bavaria.

tooltips.title: Info
tooltips.body: Target: Companies in EU and US, multinational teams, international document exchange.

tooltips.title: Info
tooltips.body: Use case: Sanitize logs, API data, test environments. Batch processing via REST.

tooltips.title: Info
tooltips.body: Zero-knowledge proofs were invented in 1985 by Goldwasser, Micali, and Rackoff at MIT.

tooltips.title: Info
tooltips.body: This is known as the "Ali Baba Cave" - a classic example from cryptography textbooks.

tooltips.title: Info
tooltips.body: HIPAA requires protecting patient health information. Zero-knowledge ensures providers can't access data.

tooltips.title: Info
tooltips.body: Financial regulations require encryption of cardholder data and audit trails for transactions.

tooltips.title: Info
tooltips.body: GDPR Article 32 requires "pseudonymisation and encryption" of personal data.

tooltips.title: Info
tooltips.body: Attorney-client privilege requires confidential storage. Zero-knowledge prevents even admin access.

tooltips.title: Info
tooltips.body: The "zero-knowledge" property: verifier gains no information beyond "the statement is true."

tooltips.title: Info
tooltips.body: After 20 rounds, the chance of guessing is 1 in 1,048,576. This is called "soundness."

tooltips.title: Info
tooltips.body: Used in blockchain, identity verification, and password systems where trust is limited.

tooltips.title: Info
tooltips.body: Argon2id is the winner of the Password Hashing Competition, resistant to GPU attacks.

tooltips.title: Info
tooltips.body: Local: Original files never leave device. Server: Only extracted text sent via TLS for PII detection, then discarded. Results in encrypted local vault.

tooltips.title: Info
tooltips.body: Server: Selected text sent via secure API for PII detection. Document stays in Office. One-click anonymization, preserves formatting.

tooltips.title: Info
tooltips.body: Server: Message text sent for PII detection before reaching AI. Anonymized text goes to ChatGPT/Claude/Gemini. Auto-decrypts responses.

tooltips.title: Info
tooltips.body: Server: Code/text sent for PII detection before AI processing. Native Claude Desktop (stdio) or HTTP for Cursor/VS Code.

tooltips.title: Info
tooltips.body: RESTful endpoints with JWT authentication. Rate limiting. Comprehensive docs for developers.

tooltips.title: Info
tooltips.body: Substitute PII with realistic fake data. Maintains readability. Use for testing, demos, training data.

tooltips.title: Info
tooltips.body: Complete removal with placeholder. Use for legal documents, FOIA requests, court filings, public records.

tooltips.title: Info
tooltips.body: One-way cryptographic hash. Consistent across documents. Use for research, analytics, pseudonymization.

tooltips.title: Info
tooltips.body: Reversible AES-256-GCM encryption. Recover original with key. Use for temporary anonymization, audits.

tooltips.title: Info
tooltips.body: Partial obscuring - some characters visible. Use for customer support, verification, user interfaces.

tooltips.title: Info
tooltips.body: Modern authenticated encryption. Used by Cloudflare, WireGuard, Signal. Constant-time to prevent timing attacks.

tooltips.title: Info
tooltips.body: Full NLP support for 48 languages. RTL support for Arabic, Hebrew, Persian, Urdu. Auto-detection.

tooltips.title: Info
tooltips.body: Detects names, emails, phones, credit cards, SSNs, IBANs, IPs, medical IDs, license plates, and 40+ more.

tooltips.title: Info
tooltips.body: Pre-configured profiles for GDPR, HIPAA, PCI-DSS. 18+ country presets. Custom entity patterns.

tooltips.title: Info
tooltips.body: Open-source PII detection engine by Microsoft. ML-powered entity recognition.

tooltips.title: Info
tooltips.body: Same Presidio backend with additional zero-knowledge security layer on top.

tooltips.title: Info
tooltips.body: Standard authentication. Password sent to server for verification.

tooltips.title: Info
tooltips.body: Password processed locally with Argon2id. Only mathematical proof sent to server. Staff cannot access credentials.

tooltips.title: Info
tooltips.body: Industry standard encryption for data at rest and in transit.

tooltips.title: Info
tooltips.body: Modern cryptography: Argon2id key derivation (GPU-resistant), XChaCha20-Poly1305 authenticated encryption.

tooltips.title: Info
tooltips.body: Standard password reset via email link.

tooltips.title: Info
tooltips.body: BIP39 recovery phrase. Recover account without server support. No admin can reset your password.

tooltips.title: Info
tooltips.body: Pre-built patterns for 256 entity types including country-specific IDs.

tooltips.title: Info
tooltips.body: Core entity types with ML-powered recognition.

tooltips.title: Info
tooltips.body: Language-specific regex patterns for 27 languages.

tooltips.title: Info
tooltips.body: spaCy (25), Stanza (7), XLM-RoBERTa (16) with RTL support for Arabic, Hebrew, Persian, Urdu.

tooltips.title: Info

tooltips.title: Info
tooltips.body: Developers: CI/CD integration, test data generation, API-first workflows, MCP server integration.

tooltips.title: Info
tooltips.body: NLP-powered detection: Names, emails, phone numbers, credit cards, SSNs, IBANs, medical IDs with confidence scoring.

tooltips.title: Info
tooltips.body: Global NLP support: spaCy, Stanza, XLM-RoBERTa engines. Full RTL support for Arabic, Hebrew, Persian, Urdu.

tooltips.title: Info
tooltips.body: Anonymization operators: Replace (synthetic), Redact (remove), Hash (SHA-256/512), Encrypt (AES-256-GCM), Mask (partial), Keep (whitelist).

tooltips.title: Info
tooltips.body: True zero-knowledge: Argon2id + XChaCha20-Poly1305 encryption. Only mathematical proof transmitted. 24-word recovery phrase.

tooltips.title: Info
tooltips.body: Desktop App: Windows 10+, macOS 10.15+, Linux. PDF (50MB), DOCX (30MB), XLSX (20MB). Encrypted local vault.

tooltips.title: Info
tooltips.body: Office Integration: Word 2016+, Excel, PowerPoint. Real-time PII highlighting, one-click anonymization. Free for all plans.

tooltips.title: Info
tooltips.body: AI IDE Integration: Native stdio for Claude Desktop, HTTP for Cursor/VS Code. Auto-anonymize before AI processing.

tooltips.title: Info
tooltips.body: Developer API: Analyze, Anonymize, Batch endpoints. JWT authentication. 300 free calls/month. Enterprise: 100 docs/batch.

tooltips.title: Info
tooltips.body: Chrome Extension: Developer Preview. Protects PII before sharing with AI chatbots. Real-time browser detection.

tooltips.title: Info
tooltips.body: Self-custody recovery: 24-word BIP39 phrase as master key. No server-side password storage. User controls all keys.

tooltips.title: Info
tooltips.body: Two-factor authentication: Optional 2FA via TOTP authenticator apps (Google Authenticator, Authy) or email verification codes.

tooltips.title: Info
tooltips.body: Made in Germany: Hetzner ISO 27001-certified data centers. GDPR compliant with DPA. No data transfers outside EU.

tooltips.title: Info
tooltips.body: SaaS: We operate, you define policies. Updates, monitoring, DR included.

tooltips.title: Info
tooltips.body: Private: Isolated environment, managed ops. White-label for service providers.

tooltips.title: Info
tooltips.body: Self-Managed: Your infrastructure. Data residency, KMS/HSM, audit integration.

tooltips.title: Info
tooltips.body: Dedicated: Policy design, integrations, training across all deployments.

tooltips.title: Info
tooltips.body: Custom: Tailored implementations, complex compliance, custom development.

tooltips.title: Info
tooltips.body: Zero Knowledge Architecture: Pattern-based PII detection with 40+ regex recognizers. Customer-managed keys (BYOK), MPC threshold custody, checksum validation (Luhn, IBAN). GDPR compliance with audit trail logging.

tooltips.title: Info
tooltips.body: Fully Offline Processing: Bundled Presidio + spaCy NLP engine. PDF, DOCX, XLSX, images with OCR in 38 languages. 5 operators: Replace, Redact, Mask, Hash, Encrypt. 20+ NLP language models.

tooltips.title: Info
tooltips.body: No entity limits. Create custom entity types using AI wizard — provide examples, system generates recognizers. Test instantly against sample data.

tooltips.title: Info
tooltips.body: Global coverage. Country-specific formats: national IDs, tax numbers, phone formats, postal codes, banking identifiers across 155+ jurisdictions.

tooltips.title: Info
tooltips.body: Sophisticated patterns. Highly refined regex with edge case handling for language variations, OCR errors, format inconsistencies. Predictable, auditable results.

tooltips.title: Info
tooltips.body: Optimal resources. Language models loaded on-demand from server. Unused models automatically unloaded to free RAM. Scales efficiently.

tooltips.title: Info
tooltips.body: Seamless updates. Components reload on every start. Admin-controlled backend updates per component. No user reinstallation needed.

tooltips.title: Info
tooltips.body: Universal integration. Office Add-in injection works across Word, Excel, Outlook and most enterprise productivity platforms.

tooltips.title: Info
tooltips.body: Enterprise control. Inject into almost all pages including Google & Co. Admin enforce mode for mandatory protection. Central policy management.

tooltips.title: Info
tooltips.body: Enterprise ready. Integration with Intune, SCCM, Jamf and most IT management systems for deployment, updates, and policy enforcement.

tooltips.title: Info
tooltips.body: AI without risk. Regulated markets can use independent or free AI safely. MCP integration into any AI workflow — Cursor, Claude Desktop, VS Code.

tooltips.title: Info
tooltips.body: Full programmatic access. API for all capabilities: text, documents, images. Custom presets, image anonymization, all API compatible solutions.

tooltips.title: Info
tooltips.body: Unified experience. Desktop app, Office Add-in, Browser Extension, MCP Server, API — all share identical anonymization capabilities.

tooltips.title: Info
tooltips.body: Full operator set. Replace (substitution), Redact (removal), Mask (partial hiding), Hash (SHA-256 one-way), Encrypt (reversible AES-256-GCM).

tooltips.title: Info
tooltips.body: Batch support. Process multiple files at once with customizable filename patterns. Queue management for large document sets.

tooltips.title: Info
tooltips.body: Large file handling. PDF up to 50 MB, DOCX up to 30 MB, XLSX up to 100,000 rows, TXT/CSV/JSON/XML up to 30 MB each.

tooltips.title: Info
tooltips.body: anonym.plus Desktop: Files processed and stored locally only. No data sent externally. AES-256-GCM encrypted vault with 24-word BIP39 recovery.

tooltips.title: Info
tooltips.body: Cloud processing: Desktop app with online recognizer has text in memory on the server for the processing time only. Cleared immediately after.

tooltips.title: Info
tooltips.body: True privacy. Client-side encryption with user-held keys. Server stores only encrypted blobs — admin has no access to plaintext content.

tooltips.title: Info
tooltips.body: Hardened infrastructure. Optimized servers with continuous self-monitoring, intrusion detection, automated threat response, and security auditing.

tooltips.title: Info
tooltips.body: Always available. AI-powered documentation chatbot available 24/7. Instant answers to configuration, integration, and troubleshooting questions.

tooltips.title: Info
tooltips.body: Data sovereignty. Full solution packaged with EU-only infrastructure. German hosting, GDPR-native, no transatlantic data transfers.
